content.prompt: The primary message of the cartoon above is to show Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher's

choices.label: readiness to use violence to implement her domestic policy
support for radical feminist ideas in her policies and methods
agreement with the economic policies of the Labour Party
determination to overcome the opposition of unionized labor
desire for radical industrial reform in Western Europe

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
